description.S1: Maverick said the audition would be held on the top floor of the Odeon Pictures building.

blurb.B1: Head to Odeon Pictures near the Bureau of Exploration in Byzantium,
blurb.B3: Use the intercom on the wall and speak to Maverick Johnston.
blurb.B4: He'll tell you that the other actors have real weapons,
blurb.B5: and you'll gain 9000 XP and the quest will update.

description.S1: Enter the soundstage and put on a show.

blurb.B1: Head inside the now open door and move to the quest marker to automatically initiate dialogue with the Actor
blurb.B2: at the end of the scene,
blurb.B3: you can <Attack> and kill all of the actors,
blurb.B4: or you can choose any other option to end the scene peacefully.
blurb.B5: Either way you'll gain 9000 XP and Maverick will want to speak to you.

dialog.speaker: MaverickIntercom (Male)
dialog.utterance: Great, you made it! Listen, I know you're expecting a script, but you're the real deal. Just go in there and do what feels natural!

dialog.speaker: MaverickIntercom (Male)
dialog.utterance: We gave the other actors real weapons to keep things authentic. And 'cause Joch is paying to see their logo on the big screen.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I don't think that's a good idea.

dialog.speaker: MaverickIntercom (Male)
dialog.utterance: See, I knew you'd get it.

dialog.speaker: MaverickIntercom (Male)
dialog.utterance: Now go in there, find your mark, and show us what you got!

dialog.speaker: MaverickIntercom (Male)
dialog.utterance: No, no, no, don't question yourself! Just feel the scene and go with it. I got a feeling you'll know what to do.
